Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Minimal \Min"i*mal\, a. Of, pertaining to, or having a character of, a minim or minimum; least; smallest; as, a minimal amount or value. [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
minimal adj : the least possible; "needed to enforce minimal standards"; "her grades were minimal"; "minimum wage"; "a minimal charge for the service" [syn: {minimum}] [ant: {maximal}, {maximal}]
